thread.title: Stay clear, atleast until remodelling is finished.
thread.title_full: Stay clear, atleast until remodelling is finished. - Review of Quality Suites Bercy Bibliotheque, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Subtilicus
title: Stay clear, atleast until remodelling is finished.
text: Bathroom elements were rotting wood, there was no standing height in the shower cabin, hallway was a construction site, with lots of noise from the construction, the room was dirty, and staff was unattentive.
